description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.unJ8E4IikZUxT7x3]{Temporal Anomalies (Su)}

By keeping a close eye on the past as well as the future, you know how to reach backward to recover the benefits of things that have recently been discarded. Once per day, you can use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.BOut7Wi1oWcnsEf3]{paradox} to reuse a single consumable item (such as a grenade, serum, or spell gem) that you used within the last 24 hours. The item must have light bulk or less and an item level no greater than your level. You must know the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.3v06vHi7BT5hKfqJ]{advanced preparation} temporal anomaly to learn this temporal anomaly
